boardgame.name: Advanced Third Reich
boardgame.description: Advanced Third Reich is a board wargame published originally by The Avalon Hill Game Co. The game is a rewrite of Rise and Decline of the Third Reich, and is a simulation of the European and African theaters of World War II. In 2003 GMT Games published A World at War, a substantially revamped and streamlined version of Advanced Third Reich, designed by Bruce Harper. Designed to reflect the corps scale, a turn represents three months of movement and fighting._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgameimplementation: Rise and Decline of the Third Reich

This game rates good but really the components are “like new” while the box is only “acceptable” sporting some damage. The game itself is unpunched and complete. If you have a spare Advanced Third Reich box sitting around you’re golden! The picture is the actual game for sale. I included one picture of the side of the box that has what looks like spray paint on it as well as the dinged corner. As I said, the components are solid, even includes an issue of “Ultra.” Write with any questions. I only ask for actual postage, estimated at $6 for priority mail in the US. Better yet, stop by and pick it up!

Condition - Unpunched and unplayed, box has very light shelf wear, components in like new condition. Payment by PayPal in advance or cash on pickup. For shipping this is considered a medium size game. The following options are available for delivery within the continental United States: 1) Local pickup in the San Jose, California area (no cost) 2) USPS Priority Mail Flat Rate - $6.60 (small), $12.65 (medium), or $17.15 (large), depending on game size. Generally very small games fit in the small box, small or medium in the medium box, and large in the large box. Box fits for some games are very snug, allowing minimal protective padding - if this shipping option is picked for such games seller assumes no responsibility for damage during transit. 3) USPS Parcel Select Ground / Non-Flat Rate Priority - varies, usually only cheaper than Flat Rate Priority for small and very light weight games (under 2 pounds), an additional fee of $3.25 for the box and packing materials will be added to the shipping costs. 4) FedEx Ground - varies, usually from $12 for short distance shipments of light weight games to $30 for heavy games (or multiple games up to 10 pounds) long distance shipments. This is usually the cheapest option for very large games. An additional fee of $3.25 for the box and packing materials will be added to the shipping costs. While expensive, this is the best method if damage during transit is a concern, as all items will be packed in boxes sufficiently sized for protective materials. Shipping rates to Alaska or Hawaii will be higher for FedEx. Games will not be shipped by any method other than a shipping box, nor unboxed or in less than complete condition, please do not ask.

This item is posted as a part of the WargameHQ Shelf Clearing Auction. The item listed is only for purchase by: johnbjr The price has been set at the winning bid, or Buy It Now, price posted to the auction item comment page. If you won multiple items, please be sure to add them all to your cart at once and then check out so I can include them in your shipping estimate. As a reminder: I will only ship to the addresses within the United States. I only accept PayPal and payment details will be sent alongside your final invoice. Your item(s) will ship on the Saturday FOLLOWING verified payment. I will provide tracking information for your item and insurance sufficient to cover the final price of the auction on shipped items. Please inspect your items within the first 5 business days of receipt, beyond that I cannot assist with disputes. I also make no guarantees implied or otherwise as to the condition of games if the carrier has been rough with shipping. I pack games in peanuts and try to ensure both the games and their contents are secured inside the boxes to minimize issues. If you fail to pay for your item within 5 business days, I will cancel the sale and list the item on eBay and you can re-bid on it there at that time. If you have any special requests, please Geekmail me so we can discuss prior to payment finalization. Thank you for your purchase and I hope you enjoy your new game(s)!
